body.p:
Caldwell County & Circuit
To His Excellency Gov Bramlett

The undersigned Members of the Bar and officers of the Court, would state that at the present term of the Caldwell Circuit Court a Judgment was rendered against Newman Estes & others as bail for one James A Johnson in the sum of Seven Thousand dollars by reason of the failure of said Johnson to surrender himself. He having been as we are informed & believe arrested by the Military Authorities & sent south before the present term. From all we know of the case we respectfully solicit in Mr Este' behalf your kind intervention, beliving it would be a great hardship to compel him to pay the same

R. T. Petree
Cir. Judge
Tho. C. Dabney
L. Peppers
D. W. McGoodwin
R L Wilson
S. Marble
J. N. Turner
S J Boyd
J R Hunter
W. Smith
F. M. English
